item.title: Learning R Part 2
item.description: Learning R Part 2 Part 2, here we go! This next part is about packages and help pages. This chapter is pretty short, and basically wraps up the dice ‘project’. Now it’s time to install the qplot function which is part of the ggplot2 package. > install.packages("ggplot2") (A BUNCH OF STUFF!!!!!) > qplot Error: object 'qplot' not found > library("ggplot2") > qplot function (x, y = NULL, ..., data, facets = NULL, margins = FALSE, geom = "auto", xlim = c(NA, NA), ylim = c(NA, NA), log = "", main = NULL, xlab = deparse(substitute(x)), ylab = deparse(substitute(y)), asp = NA, stat = NULL, position = NULL) { if (!
